description: Designing, developing, testing, and maintaining software solutions for Alexa's features and capabilities. Utilizing Amazon Web Services (AWS) to build scalable and reliable cloud-based solutions for Alexa.

Designing and developing user interfaces for web applications using technologies such as HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.  Integrating web applications with other Siri services and devices to provide a seamless user experience across platforms

Analyzing large datasets to extract meaningful insights that can inform decision-making and product development, Applying machine learning algorithms to develop predictive models and improve existing products.
Conducting user research to understand user needs, preferences, and behaviors, Creating wireframes and prototypes to visualize and test design concepts..

Implementing user interfaces designed by UI/UX designers, ensuring they are responsive, accessible, and visually appealing, Developing web applications using modern frontend technologies such as HTML, CSS, and JavaScript frameworks/libraries like React, Angular, or Vue.js.
